department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description:
The scope consist of modifying the existing cooling and ventilation systems. This includes the installation of new electrical panel and circuits, installation of new cooling units and ductwork as well as roof modification for the condenser units.

Work is to be completed within (44) weeks after contract award. The estimated cost for this opportunity is within the following category: $500,001 to $1,000,000.

MANDATORY SECURITY REQUIREMENT:  
 
This procurement contains a mandatory security requirement. At contract award, the Bidder must hold a valid [Designated Organization Screening (DOS) / Facility Security Clearance at level of Reliability Status].
